src: "Jwale re na le ditadi tse dikgwedi tse 4 tse se nang lefu la tswekere tse neng di na le lefu la tswekere," a eketsa.
mt: 4 days ago we had 4 days of rain, he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Ngaka Ehud Ur, moprofesara wa bongaka mane Dalhousie University e leng Halifax, Nova Scotia le modulasetulo wa lekala la tsa meriana le disaense la Mokgatlo wa Lefu la Tswekere la Canada (Canadian Diabetes Association) o hlokomedisitse hore patlisiso ena e sa le sethathong.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and a member of the board of directors of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says this is not a breakthrough.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Jwalo ka tse ding tsa ditsebi, o sa le leqe mabapi le hore na lefu la tswekere le ka phekolwa, a bolela hore ditshibollo tsena ha di na kamano le batho ba se ntse ba na le lefu la tswekere la Mofuta wa 1.
mt: Despite the injuries, the pilot was able to walk away from the crash, according to the airport's director.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Ka Mantaha, Sara Danius, e leng mongodi wa nako yohle wa Komiti ya Dingolwa ya Nobel mane Swedish Academy, o phatlaladitse pontsheng nakong ya lenaneo la radiyo la Sveriges Radio mane Sweden hore komiti, ha e sa kgone ho fihlella Bob Dylan ka kotloloho mabapi le ho hapa Kgau ya Nobel ya 2016 ho tsa Dingolwa, e nyahladitse boiteko ba yona ba ho mo fihlella.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, told Swedish Radio that the committee, which has not yet decided whether to award Bob Dylan the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, is still considering the matter.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius a re, "Hajwale ha re etse letho. Ke letsitse le ho romela diimeile ho mosebeletsani ya haufi ka ho fetisisa le yena mme ka fumana dikarabo tsa botswalle. Bakeng sa hajwale, sena se lekane."
mt: "We don't know what happened. I was talking to him and then I saw him fall and I found him unconscious. I called the emergency services and I got the ambulance."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Pele ho mona, Moofisiri wa Sehlooho wa Phethahatso (CEO) wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, o boletse hore khampani e qadile ha tshepe e kokotang ya monyako wa hae e sa utlwahale ho tswa ka lebenkeleng la hae ha a le ka keratjheng ya hae.
mt: Before the announcement, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was "excited" about the new product, which was announced at the company's headquarters in San Francisco.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: O ile a aha tshepe ya ho kokota monyako ya WiFi, a rialo.
mt: He was also charged with possessing a Wi-Fi jammer.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff o re dithekiso di phahame kamora boitlhahiso ba hae ka 2013 lenaneong la Shark Tank moo moifo wa lenaneo o ileng wa hana ho tshehetsa qalo ya kgwebo ya hae.
mt: 2013 Shark Tank contestant Siminoff said his company was doing well after the show aired.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Mafelong a 2017, Siminoff a hlaha kanaleng ya thelevishene ya tsa mabenkele ya QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff founded the television shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring hape e ile ya fihlella tharollo ya nyewe le khampani e phehisanang le yona ho tsa tshireletso, e leng ADT Corporation.
mt: The company, ADT Corporation, was also sued for negligence.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Ha vaksine e nngwe ya ekspherimente e bonahala e kgona ho fokotsa sekgahla sa ho shwa sa Ebola, ho fihla jwale, ha ho meriana e bontshitseng ka ho hlaka ho tshwaneleha bakeng sa ho alafa tshwaetso e seng e le teng mmeleng.
mt: 1 of 4 experimental vaccines appears to be safe and effective in preventing Ebola, but it's too early to say whether it will protect against the deadly virus.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Motswako o mong wa masole a mmele, ZMapp, o qadile o bontsha tshepiso ho lekala lena, empa diphuputso tsa semolao di bontshitse hore o na le molemo o tlase ho feta o batlehang bakeng sa ho thibela ho shwa.
mt: 1 of 2 doses of the experimental drug ZMapp, which has been used to treat two Americans, is available, but the U.S. government has not yet decided whether to use it.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Tekong ya PALM, ZMapp e sebeditse jwalo ka letsoho la taolo, e leng se bolelang hore borasaense ba e sebedisitse jwalo ka motheo le ho bapisa dikalafo tse ding tse tharo le yona.
mt: The PALM, ZMapp is a plant-based treatment, which is administered intravenously, and is currently in clinical trials.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Mokgatlo wa Dijimnastiki wa USA o tshehetsa lengolo la Komiti ya Diolimpiki ya United States mme o amohela ka botlalo tlhokeho ya hore lelapa la Diolimpiki le poromoute tikoloho e bolokehileng bakeng sa baatlelete bohle ba rona.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has filed a complaint with the United States Olympic Committee over the International Olympic Committee's decision to allow Russia to host the 2014 Winter Olympics.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Re dumellana le polelo ya USOC hore ditabatabelo tsa baatlelete ba rona le ditlelapa, le papadi ya bona, hore di ka sebeletswa ka tsela e ntlafetseng ke ho hatela pele ka phetoho e amohelehang kahare ho mokgatlo wa rona, ho fapana le ho amohuwa setifikeiti.
mt: We are disappointed that our athletes and their families, and our staff, were not given the opportunity to leave the airport safely and quickly, in a timely manner, before the fire broke out.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Mokgatlo wa Dijimnastiki wa USA o tshehetsa phuputso e ikemetseng e ka tjhabisetsang kganya hodima ka moo tlhekefetso ya bophara bo hlalositsweng ka sebete hakana ke mahlatsipa a Larry Nassar e tswetseng pele ntle le ho senolwa ka nako e telele hakana mme hape e ananela diphetoho dife kapa dife tse hlokehang le ho tshwaneleha.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association has been criticized for its handling of the sexual abuse case against Larry Nassar, which was revealed after a long period of time and also led to the resignation of its president.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Mokgatlo wa Dijimnastiki wa USA le USOC di na le sepheo se tshwanang — e leng ho etsa hore papadi ya dijimnastiki, le tse ding, e bolokehe ka hohle ka moo ho ka kgonehang hore baatlelete ba latele ditoro tsa bona tikolohong e bolokehileng, e molemo mme e matlafaditsweng.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee and USOC have a policy — that athletes, coaches, and staff must report any doping violations they witness, and that they must be reported immediately and anonymously.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Dilemong tsohle tsa bo-1960, Brzezinski o sebeleditse John F. Kennedy jwalo ka moeletsi wa hae mme kamora moo pusong ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski advised John F. Kennedy and later Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Nakong ya dikgetho tsa 1976 o eleditse Carter ho leano la tsa matjhabeng, mme a sebetsa e le Moeletsi wa Naha ho tsa Tshireletso (National Security Advisor (NSA)) ho tloha ka 1977 ho fihla ka 1981, a hlahlama Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 was a year of domestic turmoil for Carter, who served as governor of Georgia and as director of the Office of Energy Affairs (OEA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Jwalo ka NSA, o thusitse Carter ho sebetsana le ditaba tsa bodiplomate tsa lefatshe, jwalo ka Camp David Accords, 1978; ho tlisa maemong a matle dikamano dipakeng tsa US–China dilemong tsa bo-1970; Phetolo ya Puso ya Iran, e lebisitseng tlokotsing ya ho kwetelwa le ho tshwarwa ha batho, 1979; le tlhaselong ya Soviet mane Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: 1979 was also the year of the Camp David Accords, the normalization of US–China relations, the Iranian Revolution, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Setshwantsho, se bapalwang ke Ryan Gosling le Emma Stone, se thontswe mekgahlelong yohle e maholo.
mt: 2016's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, won Best Picture.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling le Stone ba thonyeditswe Sebapadi se Hlwahlwa ka ho Fetisisa sa Monna le sa Mosadi.
mt: Gosling and Stone were named to the 2010 All-Star Game in Toronto.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Dithonyetso tse ding di kenyeletsa Setshwantsho se Hlwahlwa ka ho Fetisisa, Molaodi, Sinemathokrafi, Moralo wa Kostjhumo, Bohlophisi ba Filimi, Dintlha tsa Motheo, Moralo wa Tlhahiso, Bohlophisi ba Modumo, Botswaki ba Modumo le Papalo ya Sekerini ya Motheo.
mt: 1. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 2. The Ministry of Education, 3. The Ministry of Science and Technology, 4. The Ministry of Culture, 5. The Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, 6. The Ministry of Health, 7. The Ministry of Labour and Home Affairs, 8. The Ministry of Environment and Tourism, 9. The Ministry of Mines and Energy, 10. The Ministry of Agriculture, 11. The Ministry of Works and Transport, 12. The Ministry of Trade and Industry, 13. The Ministry of Finance and Development Planning, 14. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 15. The Ministry of Home Affairs and Immigration, 16. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 17. The Ministry of Education, 18. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 19. The Ministry of Works and Transport, 20. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 21. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 22. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 23. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 24. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 25. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 26. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 27. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 28. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 29. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 30. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 31. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 32. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 33. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 34. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 35. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 36. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 37. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 38. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 39. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 40. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 41. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 42. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 43. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 44. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 45. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 46. The Ministry of Lands and Resettlement, 47. The Ministry of Health and Social Services, 48. The Ministry
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dipina tse pedi tsa setshwantsho, Bomamedi (The Fools Who Dream) le City of Stars, di fumane dithonyetso bakeng sa pina ya motheo e hlwahlwa ka ho fetisisa. Setudio sa Lionsgate se fumane dithonyetso tse 26 — ho feta setudio sefe kapa sefe se seng.
mt: 2 songs, "Bomamedi (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", have been nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate has 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ha morao ka Sontaha, Mopresidente wa United States, Donald Trump, polelong ya hae e fanweng ke mongodi wa hae wa masedinyana, o phatlaladitse hore mabotho a naha ya US a tla tswa naheng ya Syria.
mt: On Saturday, United States President Donald Trump tweeted that his daughter Ivanka would be accompanying him on his trip to Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Phatlalatso ena e entswe kamora hore Trump a be puisanong ya mohala le Mopresidente wa Turkey, Mopresidente Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: This comes after Trump threatened to impose sanctions on Turkey, President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Hape Turkey e ne e tla nka tshebetso ya ho disa balwanedi ba tshwerweng ba ISIS bao, polelo e itseng, dinaha tsa Yuropo di hanne ho nka karolo kgutlisong ya mabotho a tsona.
mt: Turkey is expected to send ground troops into Syria, according to reports, to fight ISIS, with European countries expected to join the fight.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Sena se ha se bolele feela hore didaenosara tse ding di ne di na le masiba, e leng kutlwisiso e se ntse e pharaletse, empa e fanang ka dintlha tseo di-fossil ka kakaretso di ke keng tsa e netefatsa, jwalo ka mmala le tlhophiso ya didaemenshene tse tharo.
mt: 3 people were injured, but the extent of their injuries is unknown, however, the cause of the crash is under investigation, along with the aircraft's maintenance and flight recorders.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Borasaense ba re masiba a phoofolo ena a ne a le mmala o mosootho ba chestnut kahodimo le bokatlase bo lerootho kapa "carotenoid".
mt: The researchers say the pigment is a type of carotenoid.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Tshibollo hape e fana ka tjhebo e mabapi le phetoho ya masiba dinonyaneng.
mt: 2 other aircraft were also damaged by the fire.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Hobane masiba a daenosara ha a na moqala o tiileng, o bitswang "rachis", empa e na le dibopeho tse ding tsa masiba — meutlwa le meutlwana — bafuputsi ba ne ba utlwisisa hore di-rachis e bile sebopeho se hlahileng ha morao ho feta dibopeho tsena tse ding.
mt: The researchers also found that the "rachis" — the main stem of the plant — has a number of other useful compounds, including flavonoids and saponins, which the researchers say could be used to treat a variety of ailments.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Sebopeho sa masiba se bolela hore a ne a sa sebediswe bakeng sa ho fofa empa bakeng sa ho laola motjheso kapa ho ipepesa. Bafuputsi ba hlahisitse hore, esita leha sena e le mohatla wa daenosara e nyane, sampole e bontsha masiba a e kgolo, e seng tsuonyana.
mt: The report said the pilot was not wearing a parachute and the plane was not equipped with one. Researchers said, however, that the plane was equipped with a black box, which recorded the flight.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bafuputsi ba hlahisitse hore, esita leha sena e le mohatla wa daenosara e nyane, sampole e bontsha masiba a e kgolo, e seng tsuonyana.
mt: The researchers say, because the device is so cheap, it can be used to test large numbers of samples, including those from children.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomo ya koloi e qhomisitswe ntlokgolong ya sepolesa mane Gaziantep, Turkey maobane hoseng mme ya bolaya mapolesa a mabedi le ho lematsa batho ba bang ba fetang mashome a mabedi.
mt: 2 people were killed and 12 injured when a car bomb exploded outside a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ofisi ya mmusisi e itse ba leshome le metso e robong ba batho ba lemetseng e bile mapolesa.
mt: Police have been called to the scene.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Mapolesa a itse a belaella molwanedi wa Daesh (ISIL) bakeng sa boikarabello ba tlhaselo.
mt: The mayor said the Islamic State (ISIL) militants were responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ba fumane hore Letsatsi le sebetsa ho latela maano a tshwanang le a dinaledi tse ding: Tshebetso ya dinaledi tsohle tse sistiming e fumanwe hore e qhojwa ke kganya ya tsona, potoloho ya tsona, ke phetho.
mt: 2012 has been a year of many firsts: First spacewalk, first female commander, first private company to dock with the space station.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Kganya le potoloho ya tsona di sebediswa mmoho ho fumana palo ya Rossby ya naledi, e amanang le phallo ya plasma.
mt: The sun and moon are shown in the same image, with the Rossby waves of the plasma visible.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ha palo ya Rossby e le nyane, naledi e tla ba le tshebetso e tlase mabapi le ditjhetjhiso tsa maknete.
mt: At the Rossby radius, the jet will be in the upper part of the atmosphere near the jet stream.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Nakong ya leeto la hae, Iwasaki o bile mathateng makgetlo a mangata.
mt: On his last day, Iwasaki was promoted to the rank of captain.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: O ile tlatlatjwa ke maphaerete, a hlaselwa naheng ya Tibet ke ntjha e tshwerweng ke lefu la marabi, a phonyoha lenyalo naheng ya Nepal mme a tshwarwa naheng ya India.
mt: He was arrested by Chinese police, who accused him of being a separatist, and was deported to Nepal, where he was arrested and then deported to India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Boemo ba 802.11n bo sebetsa ho bobedi maqhubung a 2.4Ghz le 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n uses both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Sena se tla e dumella ho kgutlela morao tsamaisanong le 802.11a, 802.11b le 802.11g, ha feela diteishene tsena tsa motheo di na le diradio tse sebetsang ka metjha e mmedi.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all supported, with the exception of the media player, which uses a radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Mabelo a 802.11n a potlaka haholwanyane ho feta a fetileng pele ho yona ka kgubu ya lebelo le hlahiswang le dumelwang hore ke 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are expected to exceed 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ya nyetseng mme a na le bana ba babedi ba seng ba le baholo, ha a fana ka maikutlo a matle haholo ho Miller, eo pale e neng e amana le yena.
mt: Duvall, who has two young children, said she was shocked by Miller's actions.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Ha a kotjwa maikutlo, Miller o itse, "Mike o bua haholo nakong ya dipuisano...ke ne ke sa itokisa mme ka hona ke ne ke sa utlwe hantle seo a se buang."
mt: "Mike was very talkative after the meeting...I was surprised and then I was told."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Re tla ikitlaeletsa ho fokotsa mesi ya khabone daeoksaete ka yuniti ya GDP ka majine o bonahalang ho fihla ka 2020 ho tloha boemong ba ka 2005," Hu o boletse jwalo.
mt: " We will reduce the deficit to 3 percent of GDP by 2020 from 2005 levels," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ha a teka palo bakeng sa diphokotso tsena, a bolela hore di tla thehwa hodima tlhahiso ya moruo ya China.
mt: In a statement, the airport said it would be closed for 24 hours to allow for an investigation by Chinese authorities.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu o kgothaleditse dinaha tse holang "hore di qobe motjha wa kgale wa ho silafatsa pele ebe ba hlwekisa kamorao."
mt: "We are concerned that the government is trying to cover up the incident before it is too late," said one.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: O ekeditse ka hore "ha ba lokela, leha ho le jwalo, ho kotjwa hore ba nke boitlamo bo fetang mohato wa bona wa tsa tswelopele, boikarabello le bokgoni."
mt: "When they arrive, if they are not dead, they will be found to have a high mortality rate of their own, a high rate of disability, and a high rate of suffering."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Sehlopha sa Phuputso sa Iraq se tekile tlaleho ya sona ka 12.00 GMT kajeno.
mt: 12:00 GMT is now.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Se hlokomedisitse hore se keke sa tiisetsa hore kgato efe kapa efe naheng ya Iraq nakong ena e tla emisa ntwa ya maqulwana, dikgoka tse eketsehang, kapa ho mpefala ho lebisang medubadubeng e tswileng taolong.
mt: It is unclear whether the attack was a suicide bombing, a car bomb, or a roadside bomb.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Tlaleho e qala ka boipiletso ba ho tshwara dingangisano tse bulehileng le ho thehwa ha kutlwano naheng ya United States e mabapi le leano bakeng sa Botjhabela bo Hare.
mt: 2010 United States diplomatic cables leak
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Tlaleho e seholla ka tsela e kgolo ho batlang e le ntlha e nngwe le e nngwe ya leano la hajwale la Botsamaisi ba Puso mabapi le Iraq mme e kgothaletsa phetoho ya hanghang motjheng wa ditaba.
mt: 1 of 2 sources of the Iraqi government's information about the attack is a video posted on the internet.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Ya pele hara dikgothaletso tse 78 tsa yona ke hore mohato wa bodiplomate o tlameha ho nkuwa pele ho mafelo a selemo sena ho sireletsa meedi ya Iraq kgahlanong le dikgathatso tsa leqhoko le ho theha botjha dikamano le baahisani ba yona.
mt: 78 of its members are believed to have been killed in a car bomb attack before the media center in Iraq, near a checkpoint and a police station.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Mosenate wa hajwale ebile e le Mofumahadi wa Mopresidente wa Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner o phatlaladitse hore e tla ba nkgetheng bakeng sa bopresidente phirimaneng ya maobane mane La Plata, e leng toropokgolo e bohole ba dikhilomitara tse 50 (dimmaele tse 31) ho tloha Buenos Aires.
mt: The president's husband, also a former president, was announced to be running for governor of the province of Buenos Aires, a major city 50 miles (80 km) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mof. Kirchner o phatlaladitse maikemisetso a hae a ho iketela bopresidente a le mane Argentine Theatre, e leng hape tulo eo a e sebedisitseng ho qala letsholo la hae la 2005 bakeng sa ho ba setho sa Ntlo ya Senate bakeng sa moifo wa profensi ya Buenos Aires.
mt: 1st Lady Kirchner was announced as the winner of the 2005 Argentine Theatre Award for Best Actress for her role in the play "The President's Wife" at the National Congress.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Ngangisano e bakilwe ke pherekano e mabapi le tshebediso ya tjhelete bakeng sa phallelo le kahobotjha kamora Sefefo sa Katrina; ka seo dingangele tsa ditjhelete di se bitsitseng Kimollo ya Bush ya New Orleans ("Bush's New Orleans Deal").
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized for being too slow and too small; the federal government's response was dubbed "Bush's New Orleans Deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Tshehollo ya boliberale ya mohato wa kahobotjha o tsepamisitse maikutlo ho dima kabo ya dikonteraka tsa kahobotjha ho ba bonweng jwalo ka bo-metlakgola ba Washington.
mt: A conservative group has launched a campaign to raise awareness of the dangers of counterfeiting in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Batho ba dimilione tse nne ba ile Roma ho ya lepatong
mt: 4 million people have been evacuated from Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Palo ya batho ba bileng teng e ne e le kgolo hoo ho sa kgonahalang hore batho bohle ba fihlelle lepato St. Peter's Square.
mt: 1.5 million people are expected to attend the event, with the Vatican saying that all will be able to see the Pope.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Disekerine tse mmalwa tse kgolo di ile tsa kenngwa dibakeng tse fapafapaneng Roma ho dumella batho ho ka boha tshebeletso ena.
mt: 1,000 police officers were deployed in Rome to prevent protests.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Bongateng ba ditoropokgolo tsa Ithali le lefatsheng lohle, haholoholo naheng ya Poland, metheo e tshwanang e ile ya etswa, e bohilweng ke palo e kgolo ya batho.
mt: Authorities in Italy and other European countries, including Poland, were on alert, as the death toll rose to 100.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Balatedi ba histori ba sehollotse maano a nakong e fetileng a FBI a tsepamisitseng dirisose dinyeweng tse bonolo ho di rarolla, haholoholo dinyewe tsa makoloi a utswitsweng, ka maikemisetso a ho phahamisa sekgahla sa katleho sa lekalana lena.
mt: Historical records of the FBI have been released, including records of the assassination of, among others, John F. Kennedy.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Ntlo ya Baemedi ya Ketsomolao e qadile ho tshehetsa ka ditjhelete mohato ona wa mahlabisa-dihlong wa 2005 ka ditjhelete mme ya qaqisa hore FBI e tlameha ho abela diejente tse 10 ho shebana le manyala a ditshwantsho tsa thobalano ke batho ba baholo.
mt: 2005 Medellin Cartel money laundering case is being re-opened by the FBI to investigate 10 people who allegedly helped launder money.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa o fihletse dintlha tse phahameng ka ho fetisisa tsa lekga la papadi, mabelo a 70 ka dibolo tse 41 feela moo a otlileng bolo makgetlo a 11 bakeng sa mabelo a mane le makgetlo a 2 bakeng sa mabelo a tsheletseng.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa was arrested for indecent exposure after exposing himself to a 41-year-old woman in a public restroom, and was charged with two counts of indecent exposure for exposing himself to a minor and a child.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Boramelangwana ba bohareng, Sachin Tendulkar le Rahul Dravid, ba sebeditse hantle mme ba fihlela selekane sa mabelo a lekgolo.
mt: 2003 World Cup heroes Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were honoured with the Padma Bhushan, the country's third highest civilian honour.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Empa, kamora ho lahlehelwa ke wikete ya mokaptene India e fumane mabelo a 36 feela moo e lahlehetsweng ke diwikete tse 7 ho phethela makga a yona a papadi.
mt: 36 people were killed when a bus collided with a truck and caught fire, according to police.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Mopresidente wa naha ya U.S. George W. Bush o fihlile Singapore hoseng ha la 16 Pudungwana, moo a qadileng leeto la hae la nako ya beke la Asia.
mt: 16 November 2006, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a week-long visit to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: O kgahlameditswe ke Motlatsi wa Tonakgolo ya Singapore Wong Kan Seng mme ba tshohla ditaba tse amang kgwebo le boferekanyi mmoho le Tonakgolo ya Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was accompanied by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Kamora beke ya ditahlehelo dikgethong tsa mahareng a sehla, Bush o jwetsitse bamamedi mabapi le katoloso ya kgwebo Asia.
mt: 2010 Asian Games opening ceremony was marred by a power outage.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tonakgolo Stephen Harper o dumetse ho romela 'Molao wa Moya o Hlwekileng' wa mmuso komiting ya mekga yohle bakeng sa tekodiso, pele ho ho balwa ha bobedi, kamora kopano ya metsotso e 25 ka Labobedi le moetapele wa NDP Jack Layton mane Ofising ya Tonakgolo (PMO).
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper was forced to cancel a news conference on the government's crime bill, just before the second vote, after NDP leader Jack Layton collapsed in the House of Commons.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton o kopile ho etswa ha diphetoho ho bili ya dingangele (ma-conservative) ya tsa tikoloho nakong ya kopano le Tonakgolo, moo a kopileng "ho ngolwa botjha ho phethahetseng le ho keneletseng" ha bili ya tsa tikoloho ya mokga wa ma-Conservative.
mt: Layton was criticized by the Conservative Party for his "unhelpful" comments on the party's leadership race.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Haesale ho hloha ha Mmuso wa Federale o kena le ho nka taolo ya ditjhelete bakeng sa sepetlele sa Mersey mane Devonport, Tasmania, mmuso wa profensi le Mapalamente a federale ba sehollotse molao ona ka hore ke sethetsa se reretsweng ho lebisa dikgethong tsa federale tse tla bitswa ka Pudungwana.
mt: The Federal Government has announced plans to build a new naval base in Mersey, Devonport, Tasmania, with the consent of the state government and federal parliament passing legislation to allow the construction of a new naval base to be called Pudungwana.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Empa Tonakgolo John Howard o itse molao ona o ne o sireletsa feela dikarolwana tsa sepetlele hore di se theolwe maemong a tsona ke mmuso wa Tasmania, ka ho fana ka tjhelete ya tlatsetso ya AUD$45 milione.
mt: Australian Prime Minister John Howard has announced a new $45 million fund to help the Tasmanian forestry industry, following the recent bushfires.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ho latela lesedinyana la moraorao, maemo a lewatle a bontshitse hore ho bile le tsunami. Ho bile le ketsahalo ya nnete ya tsunami e rekotilweng haufi le Pago Pago le Niue.
mt: Local media reports a tsunami warning was issued, but was later cancelled. A tsunami watch was issued for Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ha ho tshenyo e kgolo kapa ditemalo tse tlalehilweng mane Tonga, empa motlakase o kgaohile nakwana, e leng se tlalehwang se thibetse baetapele ba Tonga ho se fumane tlhokomediso ya tsunami e phatlaladitsweng ke PTWC.
mt: 7.0 magnitude earthquake in Tonga, but no tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Dikolo tse leshome le metso e mene tse mane Hawaii tse lebopong la lewatle kapa haufi le lona di kwetswe letsatsi lohle la Laboraro ho sa natswe ho tloswa ha ditlhokomediso.
mt: 60% of the state's population is expected to be affected by the storm by the end of Labor Day weekend.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Mopresidente wa naha ya U.S. George W. Bush o amohetse phatlalatso ena.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush has been briefed on this.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Sebui sa Bush Gordon Johndroe o bitsitse boitlamo ba naha ya Korea Leboya "mohato o moholo mekutung ya ho fihlella phediso ya dibetsa tsa nutlelia koung ya Korea."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the U.S. was "deeply concerned" about the North Korean missile launch.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Sefefo sa leshome se rehilweng lebitso sehleng sa Difefo sa Atlelanthiki, Sefefo sa ka Tlase ho Teropiki Jerry, se thomehile Lewatleng la Atlelanthiki kajeno.
mt: The Air Force has identified the pilot as Captain Jerry Teropiki.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Setsi sa Naha sa Difefo (National Hurricane Center (NHC)) se re boemong bona Jerry ha e bake tshosetso ya letho dibakeng tse seng lewatleng.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said Jerry was expected to become a hurricane in the next 24 hours.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Sehlopha sa Baenjineri sa Naha ya U.S. (U.S. Corps of Engineers) se hakanya hore pula ya diinche tse 6 e ka phunyeletsa mabotana a thibella (d-levee) tse ileng tsa senyeha nakong e fetileng.
mt: 6-foot-high levees were breached by floodwaters in the area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Wate ya Borobong, e boneng dikgohola tsa bophahamo ba maoto a 20 nakong ya Sefefo sa Katrina, hajwale e na le metsi a bophahamong ba letheka moo levee e haufinyane e tlotsweng ke metsi.
mt: 20 people were killed in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, when levees failed and water flooded the city.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Metsi a tsholohela kahodimo ho levee karolong e nang le bophara ba maoto a 100.
mt: 100 people were killed by flash floods in a poor neighborhood.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Motsamaisi wa Commons Adam Cuerden o hlahisitse ho tsieleha ha hae mabapi le ho hlakolwa ha a ne a bua le Wikinews kgweding e fetileng.
mt: Commons contributor Adam Cuerden has been interviewed by Wikinews about his recent comments on Wikinews.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "O [Wales] re jwetsitse maka haesale ho tloha qalong. Sa pele, ka ho etsa jwalo ka ha eka sena ke ka mabaka a molao. Sa bobedi, ka ho ikgakanya jwalo ka ha eka o re mametse, ho fihlela hantle ho phumulweng ha botaki ba hae."
mt: "Wales is a place of refuge. First, it is a matter of law. Second, if you are here and you are not a criminal, you will be treated well."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ho teneha ha setjhaba ho lebisitse ho boiteko ba hajwale ba ho rala leano le mabapi le dikateng tsa thobalano bakeng sa setsha se jereng dimilione tsa masedinyana a fuweng laesense ka tsela e bulehileng.
mt: The government has been criticized for its slow response to the disaster, which has killed tens of thousands of people.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Mosebetsi o entsweng e ne e le haholo feela o dumelehang, empa lenaneo le ne le ngotswe ho hlasimolla ditemoho tse entsweng tsa sehlopha sa dinaledi (galaxy) sa Sagittarius.
mt: The event was a total success, but the galaxy was not.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tshwaelo eo sehlopha se neng se e batla e ne e tla bakwa ke matla a di-tide dipakeng tsa dark matter ya galaxy le dark matter ya Milky Way.
mt: A group of astronomers say they will be able to detect the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Jwalo ka ha kgwedi e na le matla a kgulo hodima lefatshe, e bakang di-tide, ka tsela e tshwanang Milky Way e na le matla a kgulo ho galaxy ya Sagittarius.
mt: Even though the month has been unusually cold for the area, the tide is high, and the Milky Way is visible in the galaxy of Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Borasaense ba kgonne ho nka qeto ya hore dark matter e ama dark matter e nngwe ka tsela e tshwanang le eo regular matter e etsang ka yona.
mt: Scientists say they have found evidence of a new type of dark matter that behaves differently than regular matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Tumelo ena e bolela hore bongata ba dark matter e potileng galaxy e sebakeng se potileng galaxy ka sebopeho sa halo, mme e bopilwe ka dikarolwana tse ngata tse nyane.
mt: This study suggests that dark matter is distributed in a halo around the galaxy, and is concentrated in dense clumps.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Ditlaleho tsa thelevishene di bontsha mosi o mosweu o tswang polanteng.
mt: 1 person was killed.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Batsamaisi ba lehae ba hlokomedisa badudi ba haufinyane le polanta hore ba dule ka matlung, ba time difehli tsa moya mme ba se ke ba nwa metsi a pompo.
mt: Local residents were evacuated and a power outage was reported as the fire burned through power lines, causing a power outage.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ho latela lekalana la nyutlelia la Japane, radioactive caesium le iodine di fumanwe polanteng.
mt: Following the Fukushima nuclear disaster, radioactive caesium and iodine were found in the ocean.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Balaodi ba hakanya hore sena se bontsha hore ditshelo tse mafura a tshetseng yuraniamo setsheng sena e ka nna yaba di phatlohile mme di a dutla.
mt: 2 people were injured when the plane crashed and burst into flames.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Ngaka Tony Moll o sibollotse Lefuba le Matla a Fetisisang a Hlolang Meriana (Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB)) tikolohong ya Afrika Borwa ya KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: 23-year-old Tony Moll was diagnosed with Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Puisanong, o itse mofuta ona o motjha "o ne o kgathatsa maikutlo ka tsela e kgolo haholo mme o tshosa ka lebaka la sekgahla se phahameng haholo sa ho bolaya."
mt: "It's a very complicated process and it's very difficult to get right," he said.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Bakudi ba bang ba fumane kokwanahloko ena sepetlele, Ngaka Moll o nahana jwalo, mme bonyane ba babedi ba bona e ne e le basebetsi ba bophelo ba sepetlele.
mt: 2 people were killed, the other 2 were injured.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
